articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Libreville
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Libreville
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday arrived in Libreville to pay an official goodwill visit to the Republic of Gabon.
					 Accompanying him were Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and other suite members.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam and his party were met by Paul Biyoghe Mba, prime minister of Gabon, Paul Toungui, minister of Foreign Affairs, International Cooperation and Francophone, Angelique Ngoma, minister of Defence, Jean Francois Ndongou, minister of Interior, Public Security, Emigration and Decentralization, Blaise Louembe, minister of Budget, Public Function and State Reform, Laure Olga Gondjout, minister of Post and Telecommunications and Electronic Industry, Emmanuel Allo, Gabonese ambassador to the DPRK, and other persons concerned of Gabon and Ri Myong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Gabon.
					
					 The president made public a statement on his arrival.

articles.title: Gabon's PM Pays Courtesy Call on Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Gabon's PM Pays Courtesy Call on Kim Yong Nam
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Paul Biyoghe Mba, prime minister of Gabon paid a courtesy call on Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday. 
					 Present on the occasion were Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Ri Myong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Gabon, and Paul Toungui, minister of Foreign Affairs, International Cooperation and Francophone, Alphonsine Mbie Nna, minister for Health, Public Affairs and Families, and Emmanuel Allo, Gabonese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam had a talk with Paul Biyoghe Mba in a cordial atmosphere.

articles.title: Gabon's Government Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Gabon's Government Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Gabonese government gave a reception in honor of Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on an official goodwill visit to Gabon, on Monday.
					 Present there on invitation, together with Kim Yong Nam, were Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Ri Myong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Gabon, and other suite members.
					
					 On hand were Paul Biyoghe Mba, prime minister of Gabon, Paul Toungui, minister of Foreign Affairs, International Cooperation and Francophone, Angelique Ngoma, minister of Defence, Alphonsine Mbie Nna, minister of Health, Public Affairs and Families, Laure Olga Gondjout, minister of Post and Telecommunications and Electronic Industry, Emmanuel Allo, Gabonese ambassador to the DPRK, and others concerned.

articles.title: DPRK-Gabon Talks Held
articles.content:
DPRK-Gabon Talks Held
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Sector-by-sector talks between the DPRK and Gabon were held in Libreville on Monday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and from the opposite side Alphonsine Mbie Nna, minister for Health, Public Affairs and Families, Paul Toungui, minister of Foreign Affairs, International Cooperation and Francophone, and Magloire Ngambia, minister of Economy, Trade, Industry and Tourism.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the matter of further developing the relations between the two countries and the issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Russian President
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, President of Russia, as regards the case of terrorism that occurred at subway stations in Moscow, claiming heavy casualties.
					 Kim in the message expressed deep condolences to the Russian President and, through him, to the victims and their families.

articles.title: KPA Chief General Staff Meets Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
KPA Chief General Staff Meets Chinese Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, together with Kim Jong Gak, first-vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, met and had a talk with Liu Hongcai, new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: Gift from Indian Global Steel Holdings
articles.content:
Gift from Indian Global Steel Holdings
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Pramod Mittal, chairman of the Global Steel Holdings Limited of India, now on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned by the chairman on Monday.

articles.title: Buddhist Masses Held to Commemorate Nirvana Day
articles.content:
Buddhist Masses Held to Commemorate Nirvana Day 
						
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Masses for commemorating Nirvana Day, 2554 Buddhist Era were held at temples in the northern half of the Republic on Tuesday.
					 Present there were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and its provincial, city and county committees, priests and monks of temples and believers.
					
					 Rituals for commemorating Nirvana Day were made to be followed by sermons and speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that they are commemorating the day at a time when all the people of the country are out in a high-pitched drive for a great revolutionary surge on all fronts of socialist construction true to the joint editorial for this year, stressing the need for the Buddhists across the country to make tangible contributions to the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 They called on the Koreans at home and abroad to unite close under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" this significant year marking the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation and positively turn out in the practical actions for improving the north-south relations and opening up a decisive phase in national reunification.

articles.title: Posters for April Spring People's Art Festival Produced
articles.content:
Posters for April Spring People's Art Festival Produced 
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Posters for the Second April Spring People's Art Festival were produced in the DPRK.
					 They reflect well the desire and wishes of all the servicepersons and people to hold President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and eternal sun of Juche, in high esteem for all ages and commemorate with splendor the Day of the Sun, the greatest national holiday, as an all-people art festival praising the great man.
					
					 Seen in the posters are letters reading "Second April Spring People's Art Festival" and its period.
					
					 A poster on which the festival logo is depicted against the background of fireworks displayed in the nocturnal sky reflects the ardent yearning for the President and the intense loyalty and fixed will of the army and people of the DPRK to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Posters devoted to different panels of the festival deal with performing activities of artistes and working people greatly encouraging the people in their drive for the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: New Bearing Material Developed
articles.content:
New Bearing Material Developed
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A new bearing material has been developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on the basis of advanced technology to be widely used in economic sectors.
					 Scientists of the Rolling-Stock Research Institute under the Branch Academy of Railway Science have made sleeve bearing material of cast-steel mixed with high-purity sulfur without using copper alloy and succeeded in producing it at factories after passing the trial stage. 
					
					 It is much better than copper alloy in such mechanical properties as tensile strength, extension rate and friction coefficient and is more than 1.5 times longer in serviceable life.   
					
					  It is the same with copper alloy in lubrication condition and its production cost is one tenth compared to copper alloy.
					
					 The material, applicable to all kinds of crushers, disintegrators, presses, cranes, drawing machines, etc., has already been introduced in the Sunchon Cement Complex, Wonsan Rolling-Stock Complex and other units.

articles.title: Grand People's Study House Draws Increasing Number of Visitors
articles.content:
Grand People's Study House Draws Increasing Number of Visitors
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Grand People's Study House is serving as a reliable centre for disseminating science and technology in the DPRK. 
					 President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il made sure that the study house was built as a magnificent edifice and established its management system and ways while sending it education facilities and books. 
					
					 On April 1, Juche 71 (1982) it was inaugurated as a centre for social education with a huge capacity to house books, scientific forces and education facilities. 
					
					 The number of books, materials and e-media sent by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to the house in more than 1,090 installments over the past 28 years reached more than 690,300 of at least 620,900 varieties. 
					
					 The study house is effectively organizing lectures and training courses in conformity with the characteristic features of the applicants such as lectures on scientific theories, lectures on new technological information and training courses on science and technology and foreign languages. 
					
					 At least 4,966,700 persons including officials of ministries, national institutions, universities, scientific research institutions, scientists and researchers participated in the lectures or training courses to acquire modern science and technology. They have made contributions to boosting production and construction. 
					
					 Reeducation of scientists and technicians and technical personnel from work sites is organized by the study house under plans. Its staff members are also visiting various units to disseminate science and technology and give lectures for technicians and workers in work sites to help them settle urgent scientific and technological problems. 
					
					 It is busy providing diverse information services such as computer search for lists, E-library service and computer-aided lectures. 
					
					 More than 39.2 million people from all walks of life and school youth and children have benefited from lectures, book reading and lending at the study house over the past 28 years.

articles.title: Juche Idea Is Banner of Victory and Prosperity
articles.content:
Juche Idea Is Banner of Victory and Prosperity
						
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "On the Juche Idea" published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982) is of great significance in the cause of independence of the popular masses and the cause of socialism.
					 The Korean people, under the banner of Juche idea, proved successful in two revolutionary wars against imperialists, rehabilitation and construction and different stages of socialist construction.
					
					 Guided by the Juche idea they have ushered in a new era of prosperity with the spirit of national independence and self-respect, without vacillation in any adversity.
					
					 Indeed, the Juche idea is an immortal banner that has turned the Democratic People's Republic of Korea into an ideological power where all the people, united in one mind around their leader, are devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 In Korea the leader believes in the people, while the people absolutely trust in him. Based on the single-minded unity the Korean people have made remarkable achievements throughout the country and are now pushing ahead with the building of a thriving nation, giving full play to their mental strength.
					
					 The Juche idea is also a great banner of leading the Korean revolution to the bright future of a new century.
					
					 It, fully reflecting the aspiration and demand of the popular masses for independence, comprehensively indicates correct guidelines, strategies, tactics, principles and methods in the revolution and construction.

articles.title: US Talk about "Disarmament" Dismissed as Hypocritical
articles.content:
US Talk about "Disarmament" Dismissed as Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. pretends to be interested in worldwide disarmament whenever an opportunity presents itself but it was disclosed that Washington is the world's biggest arms exporter, thus becoming a major topic of discussion in the international arena.
					 Stockholm International Peace Research Institute recently disclosed that the U.S. topped the world list of arms export during 2005-2009.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday observes:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that majority of U.S. arms were sold to south Korea. This proves that the U.S. is an arch criminal harassing world peace and stability and a kingpin driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war. 
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the Korean Peninsula has become the world's most dangerous hotspot and a region highest in military tension.
					
					 The south Korean puppet warmongers have become more frantic than ever before in the military confrontation with the DPRK, using the arms provided by the U.S. This reality suffices to prove that the weapons spread by the U.S. are used for wars and murder, not for preserving peace.
					
					 The U.S. is not qualified to talk about disarmament as it has turned various parts of the world into battlefields, adversely affecting global peace and progress.
					
					 Huge U.S.-made weapons have been massively shipped to south Korea over the past five years. This fact urgently requires the DPRK to bolster its war deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The Korean People's Army, as it had already clarified, will clearly teach  the enemies what the strike of the army of Mt. Paektu is like and what the war to be fought by it is like, if they opt for military provocations to stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 No sophisticated U.S.-made weapons would protect the fate of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers.

articles.title: S. Korean Traitorous Regime Has No Future
articles.content:
S. Korean Traitorous Regime Has No Future
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative regime is no more than a marionette as it acts according to the script written by outsiders, bereft of any independence. This reactionary ruling group is bound to go to a ruin any moment as it goes against the requirements of the times and the desire of the people.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 The conservative regime has committed indelible crimes against the country and the nation for the past two years after putting up the signboard of "pragmatism" quite contrary to the trend of the times and the desire of the people for independence, democracy and reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This regime is bound to meet a ruin as it has become a target of curse, condemnation and elimination after being forsaken by the popular masses, a driving force for the development of history.
					
					 It can neither command support from the people nor last any longer as it is a group of stooges serving the U.S.
					
					 No desperate efforts on the part of the reactionary rulers can turn the wheel of history backwards. The south Korean people's struggle to put an end to the outdated treacherous policy and win a new policy for independence, democracy and reunification is going on despite the harsh dictatorship enforced under the signboard of "pragmatism."
					
					 As for the "pragmatism" which the south Korean rulers put up as a "philosophy for state administration", it originated from the U.S. It is self-evident that the conservative group has no way but to follow the U.S. policy of its forces' presence in south Korea and political and economic subjugation as the group is keen to curry favor with their imperialist master and pursue sycophancy and treachery to remain in power.
					
					 The group of traitors is making desperate efforts to escape destruction but such bid will get them nowhere.
					
					 The conservative authorities are bound to be thrown into the dumping ground of history before long in face of the massive resistance of the infuriated people.

articles.title: Outbursts of S. Korean Puppet FM Blasted
articles.content:
Outbursts of S. Korean Puppet FM Blasted
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Ryu Myong Hwan, south Korean puppet minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, behaved as if he were a mouthpiece of the U.S. Department of State during his recent visit to its neighboring countries. He blustered that the "north insisted on having negotiations to get the sanctions against it lifted and a peace treaty concluded" and the "north's call for the talks with the U.S. is a wrong approach".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 Very wretched is the plight of Ryu who had to read the script written by his master during his visit to neighboring countries.
					
					 Ryu let loose the above-said outbursts at a time when voices calling for lifting the sanctions against the DPRK are frequently heard from the U.S. This is nothing but the shrill cry made by the south Korean diplomatic boss, upset by such trend of the times. 
					
					 An ill-famed traitor can claim to have a normal thinking faculty only when he makes a desperate effort to shake off the disgrace. But Ryu seems to be satisfied after being branded as one of "the four traitors of 2010" as he is increasingly depending on foreign forces and escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 It is beyond any doubt that if he continues behaving as mentioned above, he will be bound to meet his miserable end before shaking off the above-said ill-fame and cursed in the other world, too, just as the "five traitors of 1905 " did.

articles.title: Imperialists' "Peace" Ballad Flailed
articles.content:
Imperialists' "Peace" Ballad Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- If a country weakens or gives up an anti-imperialist struggle, misinterpreting the change in the imperialists' methods of aggression as change in their aggressive nature, taken in by a sham peace touted by them, this will entail catastrophic consequences, warns Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 The imperialists' loud-mouthed "guarantee of peace" is nothing but a synonym for aggression, war and intervention, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the imperialists never change their aggressive nature and regard it as their physiology to launch a brigandish war of aggression and resort to military blackmail in order to achieve their avaricious and hegemonic aims. There is no change in the real nature of imperialism in the past or in that of modern imperialism. If there be any change, imperialism has become craftier and more vicious and diverse in its methods of aggression and plunder.
					
					 Their "peace" ballad is just like a sort of narcotic to create illusions among people.
					
					 Those who harbored illusions about capitalism favorably approach the imperialists and seek to achieve development and prosperity with their help. This is, however, bound to lead to a national ruin.
					
					 This is eloquently proved by the miserable reality of those countries and nations which had illusions about imperialism.
					
					 Historical facts go to prove that a country can defend its dignity and triumphantly advance the human cause of independence only when it combats any illusion about capitalism and wages a resolute struggle against the imperialists.
					
					 Their "peace" ballad is a product of their crisis.
					
					 The imperialists are now in the grip of serious contradictions at home and abroad. Economic stagnation is deepening and the people's anti-war campaign is mounting at home. The imperialists are isolated and rejected internationally. They are seeking a way out of this predicament in aggression and war.
					
					 Historical facts prove that their loud-mouthed "peace" is always accompanied by aggression and war.

articles.title: War Maneuvers Staged in Waters of West Sea
articles.content:
War Maneuvers Staged in Waters of West Sea
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers staged madcap war maneuvers against the DPRK in waters of the West Sea of Korea as part of the Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					 Two Aegis destroyers of the navy of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces which entered Phyongthaek Port on March 19 and combat warships including "Great King Sejong", destroyer of the puppet navy, have been busy with anti-warship and anti-aircraft firing exercises, marine interception operation, etc. for several days since March 23.
					
					 The military tensions on the Korean Peninsula are further escalating due to the above-said reckless saber-rattling.

articles.title: US War Moves Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
US War Moves Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and other peace and reunification movement organizations in south Korea held the 254th Friday rally for standing against the U.S. and war and urging the withdrawal of the U.S. forces in Seoul on Mar. 26.
					 Speakers at the rally noted that the people's voice of anti-U.S. and anti-war struggle is ringing louder after data on the atrocities of bacteriological warfare conducted by the U.S. were recently disclosed by a foreign news report.
					
					 The U.S. is now talking about "peace" and "stability of international order" but, in actuality, getting hell-bent on the scheme to unleash a war of aggression, they charged.
					
					 They said that the Korean Peninsula can never be freed from the danger of tragic and unethical war as long as the U.S. forces remain in south Korea.
					
					 They stressed that all the Koreans should closely get united to prevent the U.S. scheme for a nuclear war at any cost.

articles.title: Struggle against Treacherous Forces Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Treacherous Forces Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on Mar. 26, 100 years after An Jung Gun, a martyr, was killed. The statement called on all the Koreans to turn out in the struggle to reject the foreign forces and wipe out the sycophantic and treacherous forces.
					 It said:
					
					 100 years have passed since the death of An Jung Gun, but the Japanese authorities still insist on Japan's "dominium" over Tok Islets of Korea and continue the suppression and discrimination against the Korean residents in Japan, far from making apology and reparation for the crimes committed by Japan in the past.
					
					 In collaboration with such behavior of Japan, the "Grand National Party" and other conservatives in south Korea are making no scruple to conduct sycophantic and treacherous deeds, defaming An and other patriotic martyrs who resisted the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and labeling the compilation of a directory of pro-Japanese elements as "leftist action".
					
					 In particular, when the Japanese prime minister talked nonsense that "there was no way but to write Tok Islets as 'Takeshima' in textbooks for primary and middle schools", the chief executive asked the former to wait for his action. This disgraceful behavior revealed his true colors as a traitor to the nation.
					
					 The statement held that all the people should smash to smithereens the militarist ambition of Japan and, at the same time, drive out the U.S. forces who occupied south Korea to replace the Japanese imperialists, and accomplish the cause of national reunification without fail.
					
					 On the same day the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils and the preparatory commission for the Student Committee of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, too, made public statements urging the punishment of the pro-Japanese and treacherous, puppet dictatorial regime.
					
					 They appealed to the youth and students to come out in the struggle to force the pro-Japanese treacherous regime to step down at an early date by inheriting the anti-Japanese spirit displayed by An.

articles.title: Stop to Japan's Discriminative Policy Demanded in Tokyo
articles.content:
Stop to Japan's Discriminative Policy Demanded in Tokyo
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Protests by Korean residents in Japan are going on for consecutive days in demand of the withdrawal of the Japanese authorities' unjust policy of discrimination against the Korean schools.
					 On Mar. 23 an official of the Korean Human Rights Association in Japan called on a person concerned of the United Nations at the hall of members of the House of Representatives in Tokyo and disclosed the injustice of the Japanese government's discrimination policy of excluding the Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					
					 He pointed out that this policy has been shaped against the backdrop of the abnormal relations between the DPRK and Japan and it is based on contempt and hostility toward the Korean nation.
					
					 On the same day, managing directors of Korean schools and student representatives of Joson University called on officials of Japan's Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology to ask for their active cooperation in including the Korean schools in the said program.
					
					 Contending that support for the Korean schools as well as other foreign schools should be guaranteed by law, they handed over a document signed by over 10,300 persons.
					
					 In the meantime the "2010 movement for reconciliation, peace and friendship", which groups six organizations including the "Federation of south Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Unification", the Network of the Solidarity of Japanese and south Korean People and the "Japanese Network: War and Violence against Women", visited the above-said ministry on March 17 to convey the written request addressed to the prime minister and the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by European Figure
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by European Figure
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, released a statement on March 24 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 He said in the statement: Today all the Korean people call their country "Kim Il Sung's Korea" and their nation "Kim Il Sung's nation", always holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal president of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. It is because his exploits are so great and immortal.
					
					 It is President Kim Il Sung who provided historical roots of the Songun politics serving as symbol of the DPRK's dignity and honor and invincible treasured sword, the statement said, adding that his exploits would remain long with prospering socialist Korea and humankind.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in Germany
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association issued its commemorative bulletin "The Day of the Sun" on March 24.
					 Carried in the bulletin was a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The bulletin noted that the Korean people have worked hard to hasten such vast projects as construction of 100,000 flats in Pyongyang and the Huichon Power Station and perfect the drive for putting overall production processes on the basis of CNC technology after setting it as their goal to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012.
					
					 It also carried photo-illustrated news that the February 8 Vinalon Complex has been built on modern lines.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in Russia
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated with due ceremony in Vladivostok, Russia on March 7.
					 Anatoli Nikolayevich Dolgachev, first secretary of the Vladivostok City Committee of the Young Communist League of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 At the inaugural ceremony the chairman of the preparatory committee introduced the undying exploits Kim Il Sung performed on behalf of humankind and a Korean film showing the popular personality of the peerlessly great man was appreciated.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful events on the said occasion.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam arriba a Libreville
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam arriba a Libreville
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, llego el dia 29 a Libreville para realizar una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Gabonesa.
					Le acompanan el ministro de Salud Publica Choe Chang Sik, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Myong San y otros.
					
					En el aeropuerto Kim y su comitiva fueron recibidos por el premier de Gabon, Paul Biyoghe Mba, el ministro de Asuntos Exteriores, Cooperacion Internacional y Francofono, Paul Toungui, la ministra de Defensa, Angelique Ngoma, el ministro del Interior, Seguridad Publica, Emigracion y Descentralizacion, Jean Francois Ndongou, el ministro de Presupuesto, Funcion Publica y Reforma Estatal, Blaise Louembe, la ministra de Comunicaciones e Industria Electronica, Laure Olga Gondjout, el embajador gabones en Corea, Emmanuel Allo, y otros interesados, asi como el embajador coreano en este pais africano Ri Myong Chol.
					
					  Kim publico una declaracion de llegada.

articles.title: Premier gabones hace visita de cortesia a Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Premier gabones hace visita de cortesia a Kim Yong Nam
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ATCC) -- El primer ministro de la Republica Gabonesa hizo el dia 29 una visita de cortesia al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam.
					  En la ocasion participaron el ministro de Salud Publica Choe Chang Sik, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Myong San y el embajador coreano en ese pais africano Ri Myong Chol.
					
					  Tambien, estuvieron presentes el ministro de Asuntos Exteriores, Cooperacion Internacional y Francofono, Paul Toungui, el ministro de Salud Publica, Asuntos Publicos y Familias, Alphonsine Mbie Nna y el embajador gabones en Corea Emmanuel Allo.
					
					  Kim departio con el premier gabones en un ambiente cordial.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre Corea y Gabon
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre Corea y Gabon
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 29 en Libreville las conversaciones por sectores entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica Gabonesa. 
					Participaron por la parte coreana el ministro de Salud Publica Choe Chang Sik, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun y el viceministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Myong San, y por la gabonesa, el ministro de Salud Publica, Asuntos Publicos y Familias, Alphonsine Mbie Nna, el ministro de Asuntos Exteriores, Cooperacion Internacional y Francofono, Paul Toungui, y el ministro de Economia, Comercio Exterior, Industria y Turismo, Magloire Ngambia.
					
					En las ocasiones se intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el problema de ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales entre los dos paises y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena "reduccion de armamentos" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena "reduccion de armamentos" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, fue aclarado el hecho de que Estados Unidos, que solia hablar como si tuviera interes en la reduccion de armamentos a escala mundial, es precisamente la cabecilla de la exportacion de las armas en el mundo. Segun los datos recien publicados por el Instituto de Paz Internacional de Estocolmo en Suecia, EE.UU. ocupa el primer lugar en la exportacion de las armas del mundo en el periodo 2005-2009. 
					  Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que la mayor parte de esas armas fue entregada al Sur de Corea.
					
					  Esto demuestra que EE.UU. es el autor de la destruccion de la paz y la estabilidad del mundo y el promotor que lleva al borde de la guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 30 y continua:
					
					  No es casual que la Peninsula Coreana se ha convertido en la region mas candente en lo militar en el mundo.
					
					  Ahora, los belicistas surcoreanos armados con las armas norteamericanas recurren desesperadamente a los alborotos de enfrentamiento militar con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y actuan con frenesi para provocar la guerra.
					
					  Esta realidad demuestra que las armas norteamericanas proliferadas al mundo se utilizan no para la paz sino para las maniobras belicas y el asesinato.
					
					  EE.UU., que crea grandes obstaculos en la paz y desarrollo del mundo y convierte el mundo en el campo de guerra, no tiene calidad de hablar de la  reduccion de armamentos.
					
					  Durante los 5 anos ultimos, enorme cantidad de armas de fabricacion norteamericana fue entregada al Sur de Corea, lo cual demanda a la RPDC fortalecer mas y mas el disuasivo autodefensivo de guerra.
					
					  Como ya fue declarado, el Ejercito Popular de Corea mostrara bien el poderio de las fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu y el verdadero sabor de la guerra a los enemigos, si estos toman el camino de la provocacion militar para aplastar en lo militar la RPDC.
					
					  Entonces, cualquier arma moderna de fabricacion norteamericana no podra defender el destino de EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia a ministro titere surcoreano Ryu Myong Hwan
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia a ministro titere surcoreano Ryu Myong Hwan
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ATCC) -- En los ultimos dias, el ministro titere de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio del Sur de Corea, Ryu Myong Hwan, durante su gira por varios paises vecinos, dijo que "el Norte insiste en negociar sobre la anulacion de medidas de sancion y la conclusion de convenio de la paz" y que "la insistencia del Norte sobre las conversaciones bilaterales con Estados Unidos es el erroneo metodo de acercamiento", como si fuera portavoz del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
					Es muy lamentable el acto de Ryu que recita como el papagayo el guion de su amo norteamericano visitando varios paises vecinos.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					Cuando suena abiertamente en EE.UU. la argumentacion de que hay que anular las medidas de sancion anti-RPDC, tales "palabras" de Ryu no pasan de ser una queja temiendo a la corriente de la epoca actual.
					
					Ryu debe hacer ingentes esfuerzos por quitarse la imputacion de traidor, pero, recurre con mas frenesi a las maquinaciones de la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras y la confrontacion fratricida. Parece que Ryu estuviera contento por haberse calificado de uno de "4 traidores de 2010".
					
					Si Ryu se aferra a las maquinaciones de dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras y la confrontacion fratricida como ahora, jamas se quitaria hasta la muerte la imputacion de uno de "4 traidores de 2010" y sera castigado para siempre por la nacion como "5 vendepatrias de Ulsa".
